# @xprng/vendor

Binding 3rd-party libraries to the XPRNG library.

| Library                          | Description                     |
| -------------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| [Shiki](https://shiki.style/)    | Syntax highlighting for content |
| [Marked](https://marked.js.org/) | Markdown parser                 |

## Installation

```shell
npm install @xprng/vendor marked shiki
```
